DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the therapeutic efficacy of a neuromodulation technique, tDCS (transcranial direct current stimulation) used as a complementary treatment on negative symptoms. 60 patients will be randomized into two groups (active tDCS vs sham tDCS) and will be assessed after the intervention, 1 and 3 months after.Secondary outcomes shall include neuropsychological assessment, general symptomatology, extrapyramidal symptoms and social functioning.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Negative Symptoms and Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Schizophrenia with prominent negative symptoms other psychiatric or neurological diseases specific tDCS limitations
